short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to download web tables as .csv files

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically finds tables in web pages and adds "Download as csv" buttons so you can easily collect data without the need for copy and paste. "I wish I could download this as a csv" - now you can!
